titleStmt.title: SII 13.93: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 93. (A.R. No. 580 of 1920.) ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

summary.p: The inscription is much worn out. It registers an order of the Perumakkaḷ (assembly) who ‘looked after the grāmakāryam for the year from the month of Mithuna’, and who are said to have consisted of 120 members, giving a plot of land in exchange for the one below the Kiḷiñalūr tank which had been already endowed for the daily offerings and worship to the deity by the Peruṅguṟip-perumakkaḷ (assembly), but which, not having been enjoyed, had been otherwise utilised by them subsequently. An inscription of either Gaṇḍarāditya or Sundara-Chōḷa.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . korājakesarivarmmaṟkku yāṇṭu [ 4- Ā] vatu ḷ 2 10- ṉāl midhunanāyiṟu mutal sammatsaram grāmakāryyam tiruttukiṉṟa 100 2 [10]mar perumakkaḷeḻuttu . tiruvaṉan=ti
śvarattu paramasvāmikku muṉ peruṅkuṟipperumakkaḷ kiḷiñallur Erikkiḻ tiruvamirtukkum Arccanābhogattiṉukkum Āka muṉ peruṅkuṟipperumakkaḷ kalmel ve
ṭṭikkuṭuttu Anubhaviyāniṉṟa nilatte putukuṭumpu Iṭṭuk koṇṭamayil nilaimāṟāka Āḷvārkku kuṭutta nilamāvatu Ādityavadikku meṟkku kaṇavativāykkāliṉ teṟkkil 1- kaṇṇāṟ
ṟukku vaṭakku nam śrīmadhurān=takapperāṟṟukkuk kiḻakkuḷḷa nilam Itiṉ mu vakuṭu nilam nikkiy niṉṟa nila muḷḷatellām tiruvamirtukkum Arccaṉābhogattukku māvatā
peruṅkuṟipperumakkaḷ
Digital edition of SII 13.93 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
